pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regularized Multi-Task Learning // Efficient solvers for 10 regularized multi-task learning algorithms applicable for regression, classification, joint feature selection, task clustering, low-rank learning, sparse learning and network incorporation. Based on the accelerated gradient descent method, the algorithms feature a state-of-art computational complexity O(1/k^2). Sparse model structure is induced by the solving the proximal operator. The detail of the package is described in the paper of Han Cao and Emanuel Schwarz (2018) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bty831.
